laazotea.indi.server

Class INDIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.server.INDIDeviceListener
      • laazotea.indi.server.INDIClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    laazotea.indi.INDIProtocolParser

    public class INDIClient
extends INDIDeviceListener
implements laazotea.indi.INDIProtocolParser
    A class to represent a Client that connects to the Server.
    Version:
    1.31, April 12, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
